page.topic: Filtering Records to Include a Single Field Value

section.title: Description
section.description: This demonstration of Action Scripting adds a button to the Edit_Customer_Info form. This script will restrict all the records that the form displays to those where "MA" is the value in the Bill_State_Region field.

case.description: Sketch a button on the form.
Enter "MA Only" into the Label field.
Select "Query" from the Category list and "Run Custom Query" from the Action list. Click OK.

step.description: Click the Filter ('funnel' icon) button at the right side of the Filter field.
Select the "Bill_state_region" field, the "is equal to" operator, and enter "MA" into the first condition. Click OK.
Click NextÂ > Finish > Finish to return to the Form Editor.
